version_description: - Bug fixes and performance improvements

Keeping your information secure and private is a top priority. Saving you time is up there, too, so we’ve introduced a new pin feature to help you log into your account quickly and securely.

• Lines of credit now available up to $150,000.
• New pin feature adds security when you navigate between apps. Save time by logging in with your pin instead of your full password.
• Change your Kabbage account password in the app.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

- Reset your password within the app by tapping the “reset password” link in your email.
- All U.S. territories and Freely Associated States now included in the state list.
- Scan checks to add routing and account number (fixed).
- Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.

What's New:
• iOS 11 compatibility updates
• AutoFill user contact information during signup (iOS 11 only)
• Fixed bugs in the user interface for smaller screen (e.g., iPhone SE)
• Redesigned the bank selection screen during signup
Bug fixes and performance improvements

- Link your PayPal account to apply within the app
- Improved experience when linking additional business services
- Bug fixes and performance improvements
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

- Select business services during application for easier linking
- Link Google Analytics or Google AdWords to your Kabbage account
- Redesigned Overview and My Services screens to better reflect your account state
- Now supports Face ID
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

- Kabbage now offers lines of credit up to $250,000
- Updates to make finding and connecting your bank easier
- Link MailChimp to Kabbage to potentially increase your line of credit
- Fixed crash some users may have experienced after logging in
- Minor bug fixes and performance improvements

IMPORTANT: In order to continue to provide new capabilities, this will be the last version to support iOS 9.

- The Kabbage Loan Calculator helps you estimate the monthly payments of a Kabbage loan based on sample fee rates. Just select your desired loan amount to preview the loan fees and payment schedule. Loan Calculator can be accessed on the Welcome screen.

- Minor bug fixes and performance improvements

- Improved process to verify your bank account
- Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Kabbage Card now available on mobile! Request your card through your iOS device to access your line of credit wherever VISA is accepted.

- Kabbage Card now available on mobile! Request your card through your iOS device to access your line of credit wherever VISA is accepted.
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

- Ability to upload documents when needed for verification and credit line increases
- Bug fixes and performance improvements
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

- Ability to add the first payment's due date to your calendar when taking out a new loan
- View all phone numbers associated with your account
- Added more ways to complete verification when needed
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

Introducing the latest version of the Kabbage mobile app that makes it even easier for small business owners to quickly apply for a line of credit. The latest version offers:

* Fixes issue on loan details not displaying for some users

Make sure to turn on auto updates as we're releasing updates on a regular basis. Questions? Contact us at mobile@kabbage.com.

Use the Kabbage mobile app? We’ve made improvements to make accessing a line of credit even easier for your business. Not a user yet? Apply quickly right from the app for business funding. With the latest version of Kabbage Mobile, you’ll see:
- Redesigned withdraw to make it easier to view your payment schedule details
- Improved performance on older devices
- Fixed crash when uploading documents on iPad in certain scenarios
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

For small businesses, quick access to capital is important. That’s why we make regular improvements to the app. Enable auto updates to keep up with our updates. Questions? Contact us at iosfeedback@kabbage.com.

Use Kabbage from your phone? We've made improvements to make it even easier for small business owners to apply for a line of credit. With the updated Kabbage app, you'll get:

• Bugfix that affected a small number of users during initial signup

Keep your auto updates on to see the updates we make on a regular basis. Questions? Contact us at iosfeedback@kabbage.com.

Introducing the latest version of the Kabbage mobile app that makes it even easier for small business owners to quickly apply for a line of credit. The latest version offers:

• Behind the scene improvements to make it even easier to apply for and use a line a credit.

Make sure to turn on auto updates as we’re releasing updates on a regular basis. Questions? Contact us at iosfeedback@kabbage.com.

New year, new app – same flexible funding. We’re starting off 2019 with an updated look to make your Kabbage experience even better, including a cleaner design that makes it easier to navigate and manage your business's account.

Make sure to turn on auto updates as we’re releasing updates on a regular basis. Questions? Contact us at iosfeedback@kabbage.com.

- Includes ability to check your outstanding payment schedule
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

- Need to update your address or phone number? You can now do so within the app.
- Added ability to activate your Kabbage Card with a few simple steps.
- Various bug fixes and performance improvements.

- Redesigned transaction filtering so it's even easier to find what you need.
- Ability to access our social accounts directly from the app.

With this release, you can now sign up for Kabbage Payments™ to send invoices and accept payments easily, while accessing your funds from your Kabbage Funding™ account, all in one place.
